name: Kenney Jam 2019: The RPGFORMER
description:
Race to the end of this platformer, while fighting ogres along the way!

IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT YOU PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE!

This project was made in the 2019 Kenney Game Jam! 

I used the the theme "Unlikely combinations" to combine 2 of my favorite game genres, platformers and rpgs, and put them into one project! I hope you enjoy!

Controls: In the Platformer section you use W and D to move, and the space bar to jump!

In the RPG battle element use W and D to change between the options, and enter to select!

What different things do:

items: Coins, make a nice sound! Hearts, heal your health before the next fight! 

Moveset: Heal, Magic, Punch, Kick.

Punch and kick are pretty much identical, with damage having a chance to be slightly higher with kick(15-32 possible damage points), but less of a chance of it being lower with punch (17-30 possible damage points).

Heal: heals anywhere between 5 and 40 HP back!

Magic: Depends a lot on luck, but can get you anywhere from 3 to 40 damage done.

TIP: remember, the ogres have less health than you!

Some Credits:

Art:

Kenney - https://kenney.nl/

Assets used: RPG audio, RPG Ui, RPG pack,  3D characters, 3D platformer pack, particle pack, and the font package.

Music:

 Malcolm Robinson - The Courage to Fight
https://youtu.be/0l8LciA6A4U
